## Introduction

In this report we explore the **Diabetes Health Indicators** dataset
(`diabetes_binary_health_indicators_BRFSS2015`). Our goal is to understand
which health and lifestyle variables are most associated with an indicator
for diabetes, and to prepare for building a predictive model.

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(skimr)

data_raw <- readr::read_csv(
  "data/diabetes_binary_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv"
)

diabetes <- data_raw |>
  clean_names()

skimr::skim(diabetes)
